skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Deconstruct
skill.description:
For an gent to know how to deconstruct a set of given 'Works'.
When several works should be decontructed, the agent acts on each work by following the order of the elements into the 'works' list.
If "instantaneously" parameter is set to 'True', each vivisted work are magically deconstructed without any physical capability considerations. Contrariwise ("instantaneously" parameter is set to 'false'), visited work won't be deconstructed if agent doesn't have the physical capability or if it hasn't enough resources. In that specific case, agent will decide to visit the next one.

parameter.name: works
parameter.description: The set of construction to deconstruct and remove.

parameter.name: waitForReinforcement
parameter.description: Define if agent needs to wait for reinforcement when it is not able to deconstruct a work.

parameter.name: instantaneously
parameter.description: If this parameter is set to 'true', agent Unit will decide to remove the given element instantaneously, without any physical capability considerations.

link.name: reach
link.description: To go to the location where to build the construction.

link.name: deconstruct
link.description: To deconstruct and remove the given works.

feedback.name: notDeconstructed
feedback.description: Sent each time a 'Work' cannot be deconstructed (no pysical capability for instance).

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "Work" have been visited (even if one or few of them haven't been deconstructed).

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "works" is empty (no element to act on).
